trans-unit.source: Represents a data view in the data store.
The DesignerDataView class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView osztálya: számos különböző, amelyek megfelelnek egy tervezéskor adattár sémája.

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: A séma elemek elérhetővé válnak vezérlők implementing tervezők által a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>felületet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Szabályozza a hozzáférést az adatbázisséma objektumaiban meghívásával a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>metódus felületének.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class represents a single data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: A DesignerDataView osztály szerepel az adattárban egyetlen adatnézet jelöli.

trans-unit.source: A collection of DesignerDataView objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView objektumok gyűjteménye ad vissza, ha meghívja a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>metódust a `schemaClass` paraméter értéke <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> osztály a megadott névvel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> osztály a megadott névvel és a tulajdonos.

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the view.
